Long Title: To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to amend the public service loan forgiveness program.
To modify conditions of funding for the distance learning, telemedicine, and broadband program of the Rural Utilities Service, and for other purposes.
To amend the Securities Act of 1933 with respect to small company capital formation, and for other purposes.

To enhance oversight of the implementation of subtitles B and C of title III of the American Rescue Plan Act of 2021 by the Secretary of the Treasury and the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development, and for other purposes.
To allow amounts made available for the Continuum of Care program of the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development.
To amend title IV-A of the Social Security Act, and for other purposes.
To amend the Small Business Act and the CARES Act to extend the covered period for the paycheck protection program, and for other purposes.
To amend title 11 of the United States Code to modify the dischargeability of debts for certain educational payments and loans.
To impose additional requirements for covered agencies in regulatory flexibility analysis.
To direct the Administrator of the Small Business Administration to improve outreach and education on employee ownership, and for other purposes.
To reauthorize the READ Act.
To permanently exempt payments made from the Railroad Unemployment Insurance Account from sequestration under the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985.
To provide for supplemental appropriations to increase the number of Americorps members and to increase the living allowances of such members, and for other purposes.
To direct the Secretary of Commerce to establish a clearinghouse to assist economic development activities in capacity-constrained communities.
To amend the Food and Nutrition Act of 2008 to restore and standardize work requirements for able-bodied adults enrolled in the supplemental nutrition assistance program.

To amend the Consolidated Appropriations Act, 2017 to extend the availability of identity protection coverage to individuals whose personally identifiable information was compromised during recent data breaches at Federal agencies, and for other purposes.
To amend the Ethics in Government Act of 1978 to require the electronic filing of all public financial disclosure forms, and for other purposes.
To protect the cost-of-living allowance for a member of the Armed Forces assigned to a duty station located outside the United States, and for other purposes.
To forestall the loss of research talent by establishing a temporary early career research fellowship program.

To amend the Homeland Security Act of 2002 to provide for financial assistance to fund certain cybersecurity and infrastructure security education and training programs and initiatives, and for other purposes.
To improve the collection and publication of statistics relating to Puerto Rico, and for other purposes.

To amend the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 to provide that any estimate prepared by the Congressional Budget Office or the Joint Committee on Taxation shall include costs relating to servicing the public debt, and for other purposes.
